item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description: true This page provides an example of using R Markdown. x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 2.84 ## 2 2 1.99 ## 3 3 1.30 ## 4 4 4.20 ## 5 5 4.89 ## 6 6 6.38 ## 7 7 8.74 ## 8 8 8.07 ## 9 9 8.98 ## 10 10 10.83
